title: Wanderings and God’s Provision
summary: Deuteronomy 2 continues the journey summary, highlighting Israel’s travels through lands of Edom, Moab, and Ammon. God commands them not to fight certain nations but gives them victory over others like King Sihon of the Amorites.

faq.question: Why did God forbid fighting with Edom, Moab, and Ammon?
faq.answer: Because these lands were given to descendants of Esau and Lot, Israel’s relatives.
